CustomField.description: 10K Lifestyle: Clients who have spent 10K since the beginning of the Year (01/01) and who have bought at least one piece RTW and/or High End. But, did not reach 50K (in the last 12 months rolling ) yet.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clients who have spent 10K since the beginning of the Year (01/01) and who have bought at least one piece RTW and/or High End and have reached 50K in the last 12 months rolling should appear in 50K client segmentation.
CustomField.label: Is Lifestyle
